Services

Our mission is to manage your remote team’s everyday operations
while you focus on your core business

Who we are

Our two companies united for better service of our clients' needs through comprehensive workforce solutions, stronger market presence and more global access

Experts in creating of high performance offshore teams for hi-tech industry

Our core values

  • You won't notice some of our services because we make every effort to remove all the daily routine from your tasks list before you even notice.

    You will feel our care through simple, accurate and professionally noticed details.

  • We will show you every figure in our pricing model and will reserve your ability to be hands-on with any change or risk in your remote team.

    We are committed to long-term relationships built on trust and reliability.

  • We will ask you questions and learn from your feedback how to make our processes and services better and better.

    We keep pace with the fast changing IT world and constantly experiment and try new ideas.

  • Despite our strong technology focus and remote business model, we believe in the power of the human touch - we always prefer to meet you and learn more about you as a person.

    We create an environment full of optimism, empathy, friendship and fun.

Careers

Our people are those who make the world a better place to live.
Join us and get the opportunity to discover your full potential and bring your ideas to life.

  • Web designer

    We are looking for an Android developer to become a core member of our dynamically growing team!
    You will handle the entire development of our Android products. You will work closely with the product owner and design team to determine the product functionality, define the architecture, and implement the high quality internet banking solutions we deliver to our customers
